channel.title: Dragonholic Paid Chapters
channel.description: Aggregated RSS feed for paid chapters across mapped novels.

item.title: The Goddess Granted Me the [Hatching] Skill and Somehow I Became the Strongest Tamer, Commanding Mythical and Divine Beasts
item.description:
Klaus, who was on the verge of death due to a high fever, met a goddess and was specially granted the ‘Hatching’ skill. When he regained consciousness, he found himself lying in bed surrounded by his parents and his younger sister, Celia.

Later, after various events, Klaus became an adventurer and discovered a large egg deep in the forest. When he hatched it, a phoenix emerged. For some reason, a familiar contract was automatically formed, along with the bonus of being able to use some of the familiar’s abilities. As Klaus fully manifested the true power of ‘Hatching’, he gradually began to attract attention among adventurers and eventually caught the eye of the nation…

item.description:
Klaus, who was on the verge of death due to a high fever, met a goddess and was specially granted the ‘Hatching’ skill. When he regained consciousness, he found himself lying in bed surrounded by his parents and his younger sister, Celia.

Later, after various events, Klaus became an adventurer and discovered a large egg deep in the forest. When he hatched it, a phoenix emerged. For some reason, a familiar contract was automatically formed, along with the bonus of being able to use some of the familiar’s abilities. As Klaus fully manifested the true power of ‘Hatching’, he gradually began to attract attention among adventurers and eventually caught the eye of the nation…
